verbose_text: As a consequence of the fast and effective SERT downregulation, 7-day C-SERT-siRNA treatment (i) reduced 5-HT 1A -autoreceptor expression / function, (ii) facilitated forebrain serotonin neurotransmission, (iii) accelerated the proliferation of neuronal precursors, (iv) increased the expression of growth factors (for example, BDNF, VEGF) and genes promoting neurite outgrowth (for example, neuritin, PSD95) and (v) increased hippocampal dendritic complexity and synaptic plasticity.
